member.name: M:FlyPlan.Api.Controllers.FlyPlanController.GetFlight(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get flight by Id as an uniqueidentifier

member.name: M:FlyPlan.Api.Controllers.FlyPlanController.GetFlights(FlyPlan.Api.Models.Criteria.SearchFlight)
M:FlyPlan.Api.Controllers.FlyPlanController.CreateFulfillOrderAsync(FlyPlan.Api.Models.Request.FulfillBookingRequest)
member.summary: Create a flight booking with fully information
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "flightId" : "4C82AA22-3DE0-AAF8-CA37-007E7E592A89", "paymentViewModel" : { "CreditCardType" : "VISA", "CardNumber" : "50766", "NameOnTheCard" : "Chad8", "ExpiryDateInMonth" : "03/01", "ExpiryDateInYear" : "12/05", "CVVCode" : "0487", "CountryId" : "Belarus", "BillingAddress" : "219 Second Avenue", "City" : "New Orleans", "ZIPCode" : "10497" }, "confirmationInfoViewModel": { "EmailAddress" : "tgcj3@mlbn.zhsfmb.org", "PhoneNumber" : "691-6639473", "IsAcceptedRule" : true, "IsSendEmail" : true }, "travellerViewModels": [ { "PersonType" : "Infants", "FirstName" : "Lewis", "LastName" : "Reed", "DateOfBirth" : "1955-08-03", "Gender" : 2, "Nationality" : 877807523, "PasportId" : "12974", "PasportExpiryDateMonth" : "07/09", "PasportExpiryDateYear" : "10/14", "PasportNoExpiry" : false }, { "PersonType" : "Children", "FirstName" : "Herbert", "LastName" : "Pineda", "DateOfBirth" : "1959-03-29", "Gender" : 2, "Nationality" : 1888668374, "PasportId" : "10001", "PasportExpiryDateMonth" : "08/09", "PasportExpiryDateYear" : "04/10", "PasportNoExpiry" : false } ] }
